item.description:
Several TMIRCEers will be running the Hyannis Marathon or Half Marathon this year, and I'd like to see who might be interested in forming a relay team(s) - it's a double-loop course with identical 7 and 6.1 mile legs. I'm partial to the final 6.1 leg, but could also to the earlier one. This post is to gauge interest and to let the group know who is going, and which event they'll be running.

http://www.hyannismarathon.com/

Relay results from last year - go TMIRCE!

http://www.coolrunning.com/results/12/ma/Feb26_Hyanni_set5.shtml

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Hyannis Marathon, Half Marathon, and Marathon Team Relay, 2-24-13
